AND MU_title like '%'||#{svalue}||'%'
AND MU_ARTIST like '%'||#{svalue}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSIC VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MU_NO),0)+1 FROM MUSIC), #{title},#{artist},#{album},#{path},#{genre},#{lyrics},'Y',0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE MUSIC SET MU_TITLE = #{title}, MU_ARTIST = #{artist}, MU_ALBUM = #{album}, MU_IMAGEPATH = #{path}, MU_GENRE = #{genre}, MU_LYRICS = #{lyrics} WHERE MU_NO = #{no}
